verses.roman:
vimanā hañā bhaṭṭa gelā nija-ghara
prabhu-viṣaye bhakti kichu ha-ila antara

synonyms: vimanā hañā—feeling morose; bhaṭṭa—Vallabha Bhaṭṭa; gelā—went; nija-ghara—to his home; prabhu-viṣaye—unto Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhakti—devotion; kichu—somewhat; ha-ila—became; antara—different.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu rigidly declined to hear his explanations, Vallabha Bhaṭṭa went home feeling morose. His faith and devotion to the Lord changed.
